body:
--DCL (Data Control Language)
--DCL is used to control access rights and permissions on database objects
--like tables, views, sequences, indexes, procedures, triggers etc.
-->> GRANT and REVOKE

--GRANT -- to give the access of db object to any user
--CREATE a user
create user demo_user identified by admin;

-- To give session access
grant create session to demo_user;

-- To view all system users
select * from all_users where username ='DEMO_USER';

-- GRANT table access
GRANT select, insert, update ON EMP_MASTER TO demo_user;

--Revoke: to take back/remove the access from db object.
revoke delete on emp_master from demo_user;

--COMMENT: to add any descripion or info..
--1. Single line comment: --
--2. Multi line comments: /* */
